member.name: T:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper
member.summary: Wraps a and provides extra contextual information.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.Browser
member.summary: Gets the client's browser string.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.BrowserVersion
member.summary: Gets the client's browser version.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.Data
member.summary: Gets a collection of key/value pairs that provide additional user-defined information about the exception.
member.returns: An object that implements the System.Collections.IDictionary interface and contains a collection of user-defined key/value pairs. The default is an empty collection.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.HelpLink
member.summary: Gets or sets a link to the help file associated with this exception.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.InnerException
member.summary: Gets the instance that caused the current exception.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.Message
member.summary: Gets a message that describes the current exception.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.RequestType
member.summary: Gets the type of HTTP request.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application or the object that causes the error.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.StackTrace
member.summary: Gets a string representation of the immediate frames on the call stack.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.Url
member.summary: Gets the request URL.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.UserAgent
member.summary: Gets the client's user agent string.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.UserHostAddress
member.summary: Gets the client's host address.

member.name: P:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.UserId
member.summary: Gets the logged in user identifier, if any.

member.name: M:SS.Web.HttpExceptionWrapper.GetBaseException
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns the that is the root cause of one or more subsequent exceptions.
member.returns: The first exception thrown in a chain of exceptions. If the property of the current exception is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), this property returns the current exception.
